course.subject: SHSS
course.name: Capstone Project
course.description: The capstone project aims to prepare students for research in humanities and social science, and may serve as an introduction to conducting research and writing a quality research project. For those students that do not wish to do a senior thesis, it will still enable them to learn the skills associated with a detailed research project and the presentation of research results. Enrollment in the course requires approval of the course coordinator.

reviews.author: alexchw
reviews.title: 和advisor溝通很重要
reviews.comment_content:
還是那句話，選擇advisor很重要，和她溝通和合作良好，做起來自然得心應手。
在course的最後關頭會有一次匯報，要在兩個course instructor中選擇一個匯報，我選擇了Prof.Fu，主要都是人夾人而已，這個匯報都是不計分的，但匯報都要有包裝。
reviews.comment_teaching: 當然好，但大前提是要選擇正確的advisor
reviews.comment_grading:
40% Interim report
60% Final Report
Interim report 最好需要加入working plan/working schedule，一切清晰就沒有問題，最好和advisor有足夠的溝通
Final Report 就一定要提早交給advisor，以便他預留時間指導你的report，基本上沒有大問題
Final grade: A
reviews.comment_workload: 基本上選擇平時做開的題目範疇就會很輕鬆，但當然一定要有清晰的研究題目、大量的literature review以及finding，寫大概4000至5000字，citation/reference唔計，基本上可以。

reviews.author: llchan
reviews.title: B range guaranteed for Prof. Cho
reviews.comment_content:
I expect a FYP professor could help student by giving them advice and guidance. As I thought fyp is a project that can foster self learning.

My fyp topic is about china development bank which I believe is related to Cho's field of reseach.

However every time when I try to get advice from her, she will ignore my email and try to send me out of her office asap. I don't mind if you send me out of the office but please give me some constructive advice before sending me out or refer me to another professor.
reviews.comment_teaching:
No teaching.
Just 5 mins consultation.
Her advice is work hard and read.
So I just met her twice instead of thrice that required by the faculty.

When compare to other professor like Zweig, Campell and Sharif. This kind of advice is not useful.

I dont see the point of following Cho in doing my fyp.
(Special thanks to library victoria, lang tutor polong, shuan. Their advice are great and helped me to see the good and bad of my essay.)
reviews.comment_grading:
Oh just B+
I dont think she read through my essay.
If you want a guaranteed B+ then go ahead for Cho.
reviews.comment_workload:
Nothing.
You dont have to meet her.
She wont ask you to do anything specific.
Self-paced.
